title: Piedmont F42 for a Piedmont F42?
author: Marslife

posts.post_title: Piedmont F42 for a Piedmont F42?
posts.post_content:
Hey All!

I have a Vic Willis Throwing encased in an SGC 10 holder, it also has a PSA 1 flip as well.

I would like to trade it for a Rube Marquard "Follow Through" similar condition, preferably with a presentable back.

Let me know if there is any interest.  Thanks!!!

some photos below, let me know if you would like additional photos.

thanks!!

Cliff
